attributes.comment:
The proposed rule change of the Adjustment of the Immigrant and Naturalization
Benefit Application and Petition Fee Schedule will cause incredible hardship for
immigrant families. As someone who works with new Americans, I have the
opportunity to see immigrant families start their lives over on a daily basis. I see
immigrant workers with entry level jobs struggle to meet the basic needs of their
families. At the same time, I see these same immigrants talk of their
naturalization ceremony with the same enthusiasm as they do the birth of a child.
While it is understandable that USCIS must use fees to improve their services, it
pains me that the fee increases - particularly for naturalization - may not permit
immigrants to become American citizens, something that they desperately want -
and which we as Americans do as well.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Louisa Saratora
